home.gammaExposureDesc: Track MM gamma exposure to identify price magnets (Max Pain) and resistance levels. Institutional-grade data visualization.
home.darkPoolTrackingDesc: Detect large block trades and institutional accumulation invisible on regular exchanges. Follow the smart money.
home.sniperSignalDesc: Auto-scan for '3-day surge candidates' with aligned momentum, flow, and technicals. Capture high-probability entry timing.

guardian.title: GUARDIAN
guardian.subtitle: Analyze market-wide GEX positioning and macro conditions
guardian.bullRegime: Bull Market Entry :: Aggressive Buy (Alpha Seek)
guardian.selectSectorOnMap: Select a sector on the map

command.title: COMMAND
command.subtitle: Analyze individual stock gamma structure and tactical range
command.marketClosed: Market closed: Evaluate triggers during Pre/Regular session
command.optionsVerify: Options verify: Pending ‚Üí Structure-based triggers disabled
command.gammaCoverageLow: Low gamma coverage: GEX interpretation on hold
command.observeNeeded: Observation needed: Re-enter at key levels
command.aboveMaxPain: üìà Above Max Pain ‚Üí Downward convergence pressure
command.belowMaxPain: üìâ Below Max Pain ‚Üí Upward convergence expected
command.nearMaxPain: ‚öñÔ∏è Near Max Pain ‚Üí Current level maintained
command.netGexTooltip: Volatility tendency based on market maker positions.\n(+) Positive: Price movement suppressed (stable/range-bound)\n(-) Negative: Price movement amplified (volatile/squeeze risk)
command.marketClosedNoWhaleSignal: Market Closed - No live whale signal

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Analyze holdings with Alpha Score and monitor signals
portfolio.startPortfolio: Add stocks to start your portfolio
portfolio.addNewHoldingDesc: Add a new holding to your portfolio

intel.title: INTEL
intel.subtitle: AI-powered rumor analysis and real-time intelligence feed

options.noDataDesc: API connection failed or data does not exist.
options.gemsEngineNote: GEMS V8.1 Engine: Full option chain deep scan complete
options.partialDataMissingDesc: Option contract list obtained, but Open Interest data is not available.
options.maxPainDesc: The price at which option buyers suffer the maximum loss at expiration.
options.dealerVolatile: Dealers are accelerating volatility, sharp moves possible. (Caution)
options.strategicEdgeDesc: System recommendation based on supply/demand (GEX) and price deviation.

flowRadar.volumePreMarket: ‚ö° Volume: Pre-market wait - Activates at market open
flowRadar.volumeActive: ‚ö° Volume: Day trading/Momentum - Where whales fight today
flowRadar.oiSwing: üè∞ OI (Open Interest): Swing/Trend - Real S/R walls built by MM
flowRadar.hiddenPositionDesc: This chart analyzes hidden positions and hedging structures of Whales and Market Makers (MM) that regular investors cannot see.
flowRadar.pulseDetail: This is where institutional money is flowing now.
flowRadar.buyTacticDetail: When price strongly breaks through the green wall (resistance), it's a buy opportunity.
flowRadar.sellTacticDetail: When price breaks below the red wall (support), it's time to cut losses/sell.

performance.collectingDataDesc: Measured from D+3 after report generation.

gems.holdReasonDefault: Safe mode: Reconnecting live data, but maintaining current positions is advantageous. (Score gap +0.00)
gems.holdStrategyDefault: Maintain NVDA 40%, MSTR 30%, PLTR 30% allocation. No institutional exit signals. (Failover Active)
gems.safetyBufferLock: Current logic locked by safety buffer.

howItWorks.guideSubtitle: Learn the meaning and usage of each indicator
howItWorks.heroDescription: SIGNUM HQ analyzes options market data including Gamma Exposure (GEX), Max Pain, and Options Flow to provide support/resistance levels and volatility turning points.
howItWorks.guardianDesc: GEX positioning and market phase analysis for the overall market
howItWorks.commandDesc: Gamma levels, GEX engine, and tactical range analysis for individual stocks
howItWorks.intelDesc: AI rumor analysis and real-time intelligence feed
howItWorks.portfolioDesc: Portfolio management with Alpha Score and Signal Badge
howItWorks.watchlistDesc: Watchlist monitoring metrics and column explanations

commandGuide.subtitle: Analyzes gamma structure and tactical range of individual tickers

gammaFlip.meaning: The price level where dealer gamma positioning flips from long to short (or vice-versa). Market volatility characteristics change around this level.
gammaFlip.longGammaDesc: Long Gamma Zone - Price stabilization tendency, suppressed volatility
gammaFlip.shortGammaDesc: Short Gamma Zone - Expanded volatility, potential trend acceleration

netGex.meaning: Total gamma exposure of the current options market. Positive means dealers are long gamma, negative means short gamma.
netGex.stableDesc: Dealer Long Gamma ‚Üí Volatility Suppression, Price Stability
netGex.volatileDesc: Dealer Short Gamma ‚Üí Volatility Expansion, Direction Acceleration

tacticalRange.meaning: Short-term support/resistance levels and Max Pain price derived from options data.

risk.meaning: Measures the impact of 0DTE options and short squeeze risk.
risk.impactDesc: Percentage of 0DTE options in total GEX. >30% implies volatility caution before close.
risk.squeezeDesc: LOW/MED/HIGH - Squeeze probability. Higher means potential for sharp upward reversal.

intelGuide.subtitle: Provides AI-based market rumors and news intelligence

aiRumor.meaning: Analyzes market rumors and their credibility detected by AI from social media, news, and forums.

intelFeed.meaning: AI analyzes real-time news collected from major financial media and summarizes key information.
intelFeed.descIntro: Each news item includes the following information:
intelFeed.summaryDesc: Core content summary generated by AI

portfolioGuide.subtitle: Manage your portfolio with Alpha Score and Signal Badge of held tickers

alphaScore.meaning: Ticker strength score combining price momentum, options flow, GEX, etc. Higher values imply higher upside potential.

signalBadge.meaning: Investment action suggestion based on Alpha Score and market conditions.

confidence.meaning: Displays confidence level of the Signal Badge in percentage. Higher values mean higher certainty.

sparkline.meaning: Displays recent 20 price data points as a mini chart. Identify trends at a glance.
sparkline.descIntro: Sparkline is displayed next to ticker name:

watchlistGuide.subtitle: Monitor key indicators of your interested tickers at a glance

alphaColumn.meaning: Displays Alpha Score of each ticker numerically. Quickly grasp strength with grades (A/B/C/D/F).
alphaColumn.desc: Grades are distinguished by color next to the number. <green>Green</green> is Bullish, <red>Red</red> is Bearish.

whaleIndex.meaning: Estimates institutional (whale) accumulation/distribution based on GEX and Put/Call Ratio.

rsi.meaning: 14-day Relative Strength Index. Technical indicator to judge overbought/oversold conditions.

gammaFlip.meaning: Displays Gamma Flip Level or current gamma state of the ticker.
gammaFlip.flipDesc: Gamma Flip Price + Current Gamma Zone

maxPain.meaning: Price that maximizes losses for option holders at expiry. Tendency to converge to this price as expiry approaches.
maxPain.descIntro: Distance(%) from current price to MaxPain is also displayed:

gex.meaning: Displays Net GEX in $M and long/short status with a badge.

flowRadarGuide.subtitle: Tracks real-time large scale option trades and institutional flows

flowSniper.meaning: Detects large option trades (Premium $50K+) in real-time to track institutional directional bets.
flowSniper.bullishDesc: Call Buys or Put Sells Dominant - Bullish Bet
flowSniper.bearishDesc: Put Buys or Call Sells Dominant - Bearish Bet

netPremium.meaning: Displays net difference between Call and Put premiums. Positive means Calls dominant, negative means Puts dominant.

volumeStrength.meaning: Indicates how active current option volume is compared to average.
volumeStrength.activeDesc: Above Average Volume ‚Üí High Institutional Participation

guardianGuide.subtitle: Analyzes market-wide GEX positioning and macro conditions

strategicValue.title: Strategic Value
strategicValue.desc: Highest level analysis tool to identify market-wide direction and volatility regime

gravityGauge.title: GRAVITY GAUGE
gravityGauge.subtitle: Relative Liquid Strength Index
gravityGauge.desc: Measures market-wide liquidity strength on a 0-100 scale. Combines price momentum and fund flow to intuitively indicate if the market is Bearish, Neutral, or Bullish.

priceFlow.title: PRICE & FLOW DIVERGENCE
priceFlow.subtitle: Price-Flow Divergence Analysis
priceFlow.desc: Measures divergence between price movement (EXT) and actual fund flow (INT). Price rising but outflow signals <warning>Correction Imminent</warning>, while price falling but inflow signals <opportunity>Ready to Rebound</opportunity>.

rvol.title: RVOL by Index
rvol.desc: Displays Relative Volume (RVOL) for NASDAQ/DOW. Over 100% means active trading above average, over 200% means <highlight>Exceptional Interest</highlight>.

flowMap.title: FLOW TOPOGRAPHY MAP
flowMap.subtitle: Sector Fund Flow Visualization
flowMap.desc: Visualizes real-time fund flow of 11 sectors as a network. Circle size represents market cap, position represents correlation between sectors.
flowMap.tip: Identify fund flows in theme sectors like AI INFRA, ENERGY at a glance.

tactical.title: TACTICAL VERDICT
tactical.subtitle: Tactical Conclusion & Action Guide
tactical.desc: Synthesizes all indicators to present a <highlight>Final Verdict</highlight> on the current market. Supports immediate decision making via MOMENTUM, TARGET LOCK, and REGIME.
tactical.neutral: No Direction - Watch Recommended, Hold Existing

rlsi.title: MARKET ESSENCE (RLSI)
rlsi.subtitle: Market Essence Analysis
rlsi.desc: Displays current market session status and analysis availability in real-time. Different analysis logic applies for Premarket, Regular, and Aftermarket sessions.

insight.title: Insight
insight.subtitle: 3-Day Deep Precision
insight.desc: AI deep analysis without speculation derives core insights for the next 72 hours.

velocity.title: Velocity
velocity.subtitle: Alpha Velocity 0.1
velocity.desc: Hunts only the top 0.1% alpha rising right now with S1 grade data precision and mechanical speed.

signal.shortGammaAboveMaxPain: Short Gamma + Above Max Pain ‚Üí Downside pressure, Hold
signal.longGammaBelowMaxPain: Long Gamma + Below Max Pain ‚Üí Upside potential, Entry possible
signal.supportPutFloor: Put Floor Support ‚Üí Safe entry zone
signal.longGammaEntry: Long Gamma Entry ‚Üí Stable uptrend expected
signal.shortGammaCaution: Short Gamma Zone ‚Üí Volatility expansion warning

legal.disclaimer: By continuing, you agree to our
legal.checkboxAgree: [Required] I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

terms.intro: Thank you for using SIGNUM HQ (the "Service"). These Terms of Service govern your rights and obligations in using the Service.
terms.investmentContent: All data, analysis, and information provided by SIGNUM HQ (including Gamma Exposure, Options Flow, Max Pain, etc.) are for statistical reference only and do not constitute investment advice or recommendations to buy or sell any securities. You are solely responsible for all investment decisions and their outcomes.
terms.dataContent: We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the Service. We shall not be held liable for any damages arising from system errors, data delays, third-party API failures, or other technical issues.
terms.refundContent: Due to the nature of digital content services, refunds may be limited after information has been accessed or data has been viewed. Refund requests will only be considered within 7 days of payment and before substantial use of the Service.
terms.ageContent: This Service is available only to users aged 18 or older. By signing up and using the Service, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old. We are not responsible for any issues arising from use by minors.
terms.changesContent: We may modify these Terms at any time and will notify you through the Service. If you do not agree to the modified Terms, you must discontinue use of the Service.

privacy.intro: SIGNUM HQ (the "Service") values your privacy and complies with applicable laws and regulations.
privacy.collectContent: We collect the following information to provide our Service: email address, profile name (when using OAuth providers), IP address, and device information.
privacy.purposeContent: Collected information is used for: user identification and authentication, subscription management and payment processing, service quality improvement and optimization, and customer support.
privacy.retentionContent: Personal information is retained during your use of the Service and is deleted immediately upon account termination, except where retention is required by applicable law.
privacy.gdprContent: You may request access to, correction, or deletion of your personal information at any time. You may also exercise your right to data portability to receive your data in a structured format. These rights can be exercised through Service settings or by contacting customer support.
privacy.securityContent: We implement industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your personal information and prevent unauthorized access or disclosure.
privacy.contactContent: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact our customer support.
